title: Collaborative Language Proficiency Enhancement Course Using Online Learning Discussion Boards

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational language knowledge related to work tasks
context.additional_context: Program for Learners in Manager/Leader Roles to Develop Language Proficiency by Combining Online Discussion Boards and Offline Workshops in a BYOD Environment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use over 80% of work-related language expressions during collaborative problem-solving processes with peers via discussion boards
Learners can participate in discussion boards at least three times weekly and provide feedback that fosters a sense of belonging to the learning community
Learners can synthesize peer discussion content to draft a 500+ character business report as part of project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
